summary: VA and DOD integrated their medical facilities in North Chicago as a 5-year demonstration project. Their evaluation report recommended that they continue to operate as an integrated facility, while suggesting some improvements. We reviewed their report and found that it lacked specific time frames and interim milestones for making these improvements, and an updated cost-effectiveness analysis. We recommended that the agencies develop specific timeframes and...
title: Federal Health Care Center: VA and DOD Need to Develop Better Information to Monitor Operations and Improve Efficiency
